name: browser
description: Control Chrome browser automatically: navigate, click, type, scroll, screenshot

tools.name: browser_action
tools.description: Controls Chrome browser automatically. Actions: navigate(url), click(index), type(index, text), key_press(key), scroll(direction), read(), wait_for_page_change(timeout, interval), screenshot(), back(), close(). After each action, returns updated list of interactive elements with index numbers.
